abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission has subpoenaed Apple Chief Executive Officer Steven P. Jobs to give a deposition in a backdating lawsuit against the company’s former general counsel, according to press reports, citing court documents.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission has subpoenaed Apple Chief Executive Officer Steven P. Jobs to give a deposition in a backdating lawsuit against the company’s former general counsel, according to press reports, citing court documents.

headline.main: S.E.C. Said to Subpoena Jobs in Apple Options Suit
